creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: open circle that appears to be rotting tire or circluar piece of wood; white/brown
medium: Stoneware with embedded pre-fired white porcelain
text: Yoshimi created a charred appearance, like burnt firewood, to evoke the scarring yet naturally beautiful effects of fire. Except for brief stints as an artist-in-residence in Japan and China, she has lived and worked in France.
title: Cercle
